title: Weekly Digest (16 June, 2019 - 23 June, 2019)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 45 issues were created.
Of these, 11 issues have been closed and 34 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #8468 [Changed placeholder to show "Enter password"](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8468), by [demmojo](https://github.com/demmojo)
:green_heart: #8467 [Docker Linux Desktop Image Build Recommendation/Guidance](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8467), by [NH603](https://github.com/NH603)
:green_heart: #8466 [dapp permissions sheet animation with native driver](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8466), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #8465 [stickers panel animation with native driver](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8465), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #8464 [search input animation with nativeDriver](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8464), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #8463 [signing sheet animation with nativeDriver](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8463), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #8462 [Swipe back from "Sign in to status" (accounts list) leads to empty login form and at attempt to login - "Unknown status-go error"](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8462), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #8461 [fix network switching in dev mode](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8461), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #8460 [Username is doubled in public chat after opening user profile from public chat and going back](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8460), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #8459 [[Android] default white background on all screens](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8459), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #8458 [[Multi-Account] Share wallet with pop-up design ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8458), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #8457 [[Multi-Account] Display token values for recovered account ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8457), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #8456 [[Multi-Account] Display collectibles in empty state](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8456), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #8454 [Screenshots disallowed on Android](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8454), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #8453 [[8452] remove scroll-view hack](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8453), by [bitsikka](https://github.com/bitsikka)
:green_heart: #8452 [perhaps remove scroll-view hack in chat view with updated solution](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8452), by [bitsikka](https://github.com/bitsikka)
:green_heart: #8451 [add a Jenkinsfile for nightly end-to-end tests](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8451), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #8450 [[WIP] Multiaccount wallet screen e2e test fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8450), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #8449 [Use react-native-screens](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8449), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:green_heart: #8448 [[Multi-Account] Show signing phrase](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8448), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #8447 [[Multi-Account] Design touch-ups for account explorer + wallet UI](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8447), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #8446 [[Multi-Account] Build account settings for individual wallet ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8446), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #8445 [[Fix #8067] Added screens for ENS preferred name selection](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8445), by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
:green_heart: #8444 [Two-pane UI on large screens](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8444), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:green_heart: #8443 [[#8026] Add loading state for currency conversion](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8443), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #8442 [App crash when clicking on  'Join public chat' [Desktop]](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8442), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #8441 [Long sync (90+ sec) when Fetch24History in 1-1 / Group chats](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8441), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #8439 [Sticker market selected icon is sometimes incorrect](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8439), by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
:green_heart: #8438 [preload main tabs after login](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8438), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #8435 [[7968] Feature Information bottom sheet on Wallet > [Receive]](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8435), by [bitsikka](https://github.com/bitsikka)
:green_heart: #8432 [ fix array bug](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8432), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:green_heart: #8431 [Fix bug with outgoing-status](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8431), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:green_heart: #8428 [Can't run ios develop build on iPad 5th generation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8428), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:green_heart: #8426 [E2E tests fail with Python key error](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8426), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #8455 [Investigate time to load token value](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8455), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:heart: #8440 [Improved chat message tapping area](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8440), by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
:heart: #8437 [Tx in Dapp multiaccount followup e2e fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8437), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #8436 [Ensure shell.nix uses same nixpkgs as the rest of the environment](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8436), by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:heart: #8434 [Ensure shell.nix uses same nixpkgs as the rest of the environment](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8434), by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:heart: #8433 [[wip] faster transition](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8433), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #8430 [keep SSL_CERT_FILE and NIX_SSL_CERT_FILE env variables](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8430), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #8429 [[android] ignore the gms version from `react-native-http-bridge`.](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8429), by [mandrigin](https://github.com/mandrigin)
:heart: #8427 [bitcoincash:qqtuqpd7twp7cznjcr694yaegr2ejc009swz95f3v0](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8427), by [Amolrada2442](https://github.com/Amolrada2442)
:heart: #8425 [[#8348] [Multi-Account] Account overview + individual wallet UI](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8425), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #8424 [5124 detect right to left text direction](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8424), by [katzdan](https://github.com/katzdan)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #8440 [Improved chat message tapping area](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8440), by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
It received :+1: x1, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x4.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #8425 [[#8348] [Multi-Account] Account overview + individual wallet UI](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8425), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
It received 26 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 37 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 26 pull requests were updated.

# COMMITS
Last week there were 11 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [Improved chat message tapping area  Signed-off-by: Vitaliy Vlasov <siphiuel@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/797d8037e0ef6706928b56526fcbfa143d29345f) by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Tx in Dapp multiaccount followup e2e fix  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/3973ebd607f4765cd8bbc874e784c596b014ad87) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Ensure shell.nix uses same nixpkgs as the rest of the environment  also remove gradle wrapper  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/fad5f318cf0e41609372348cc688cc1e96f8f3a3) by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Check tribute if contact was added (but not otherwise)  Signed-off-by: Vitaliy Vlasov <siphiuel@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/b6163b8ae5dde7d162af491770caf63063c56a0a) by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:hammer_and_wrench: [upgrade react-navigation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/2ad4c9c0544e5abf65730226678d17900837e053) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix stickers and wallet e2e tests  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c9048f2e358e92cb73663abf7f388db388d3271a) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#8348] [Multi-Account] Account overview + individual wallet UI  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/26bbac83bcdb2f8d2f898c20b3414c018ff47e45) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [use nix shell for running fastlane ios clean  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/33840b7b84bdb400f159fde5b990fffed2890358) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[mobile] switch to png icons](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/6da2c93a41b81118769b0748ce362ca890f2c163) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[Fixes #8066] Added native ENS registration  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/8aa16520c643ad9e20faaf8526b0d735d588c732) by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[android] ignore the gms version from `react-native-http-bridge`.  `react-native-http-bridge` has an unbound dependency on GMS, that sometimes brings unnecessary transitive dependencies to our builds.  This commit forces to ignore this depencency.  Signed-off-by: Igor Mandrigin <i@mandrigin.ru>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/23702dc1e794303c80fa668b569accc9a804bc21) by [mandrigin](https://github.com/mandrigin)
